-- | A simple Haskell library for copying text to the clipboard in a cross-platform way.

--   cross-platform way.
@package clippard
@version 0.1.1


-- | A simple library fro copying to the clipboard.
module System.Clippard

-- | Paste text to the command-line. Automagically determines operating
--   system.
paste :: String -> IO ()
